name: meg v0.2.4
body: * Removes `--nopath` option as it broke a few things; need a better way to implement it

name: meg v0.2.2
body:
- Adds `--location` / `-L` option for default HTTP engine (issue #18)
- Adds `--timeout` / `-t` option for default HTTP engine (issue #22)

name: meg v0.2.1
body: - Adds support for a single host (issue #20)

name: meg v0.2.0
body: - Switches prefix/suffix terminology to host/path (issue #21). Although this is a breaking change, I think it's the right thing to do for usability.

name: meg v0.1.3
body: - Adds the ability to use the [rawhttp](https://github.com/tomnomnom/rawhttp) library (experimental)

name: meg v0.1.2
body: * Output filenames now use a hash of their contents to avoid overwriting files accidentally (thanks @cmbuckley!)

name: meg v0.1.1
body: * Adds rate limiting (`-d` / `--delay` option) - thanks to @hrbrmstr for kicking me in to getting done :)
